text.text_translated:
Scientists ask how genetics influence language.  
They wonder if a change in DNA gave us speaking ability.  
The change happened between 200,000 and 100,000 years ago.  
It seems to link the brain with how we control our mouth.  
It also links the brain with how we control our face.  
Monkeys have a similar DNA part.  
They do not have this change.  
Scientists are not sure how much DNA affects language.  
They hope to find more answers in DNA one day.
